The video was published on Facebook on N: 2020, and was accompanied by a caption stating that it shows Kolkata resuming its local suburban EMU train after 8 months.
The video: s caption in Bangla language mentions Ranaghat station and refers to a test for West Bengal Police Constable, indicating that it is not related to the present time or the restoration of EMU services.
A reverse image search using keyframes f: 2018, which further confirms that the video is not recent.
India: s Eastern Railways denied the claim on Twitter on November 13, 2020, stating that the video is old and misleading, and not related to the restoration of EMU services.
